text: Is there anyone on HubSpot product team I could talk to regarding the theme upload feature using a .zip instead of using the CLI. It works sometimes but then other times I see a _MACOSX folder with some of the files. When I delete a theme folder I also still see a card in settings > website > themes and no way to delete this to start over. Overall it seems buggy.
Not sure where this question belongs, but how can I install a public app into an existing HubSpot account?  It's a new app, so it's not yet listed on the marketplace.
